Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add unified /new-request command for bugs and features

New:
- /new-request command: AI classifies as BUG or FEATURE, follows appropriate flow
- Bugs section in product-system.md template
- Abandon/cancel flow at any decision gate

Changes:
- CLAUDE.md: Updated quick start with /new-request
- command-guide.md: New workflows for bugs, abandon flow, updated reference card
- product-system.md: Added Bugs section with status tracking

Features of /new-request:
- Classification gate: AI asks questions, determines BUG vs FEATURE
- User confirms classification before proceeding
- Bug flow: 6 phases \(simpler than feature flow\)
- Feature flow: 9 phases \(existing deliver flow\)
- Abandon at any gate: Say "abandon" or "cancel" to exit cleanly
- Always updates documentation \(product-system.md, lessons.md\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

behzad-framework v2.0.0

See README.md for updated documentation.
EOF
\)")
